Class Buyer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client
      • Buyer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Buyer
extends Client
    This class is a subclass of Client and implements the functionality for the buyer of the auction.
    See Also:
